description:
cPrime CEO, Zubin Irani, will discuss the very separate journeys of both Agile and DevOps practices in the mainstream of software development.  Inspecting the intersection of DevOps and Agile as a dynamic duo in the effort towards expedited delivery, we will look to the future of how aligning the two together will provide wide spread increased visibility, productivity and efficiencies for teams and organizations.

Delivered by Zubin Irani
title: Jenkins World 2016 - Is DevOps Bigger than Agile? What the Future Holds
